General.Name: Adata Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: ADATA Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells memory products worldwide. The company provides computer memory products, solid state drives (SSDs), external SSDs/external hard drives, USB flash drives, memory cards, power banks, USB cables, and AI translators; axial flux motors, air-cooled motors, liquid-cooled motors, and motor controllers; and LED lighting products. It also offers notebooks, PC parts and components, peripherals, keyboard, mouse, and headset. In addition, the company engages in the agricultural biotech related business; design, manufacturing, and trading of semiconductor components; and wholesale and retail of food products. Further, it trades in electronic materials and components; sells electric tricycle; and offers Web portal, general investment, culture and education, creative, and art and culture exhibition services. The company was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 258, Liancheng Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 235
